assignments.description: SessionId may be used by flows calling this as a subflow
assignments.name: SetSessionId
assignments.label: Set Session Id

decisions.description: Is the Program an AIHW Reporter?
decisions.name: AIHW_Reporter
decisions.label: AIHW Reporter?

decisions.name: CheckIfAddingParticipantToSession
decisions.label: Check If Adding Participant To Session

decisions.description: Is the previous months collection period missing?
decisions.name: CollectionPeriodMissing
decisions.label: Collection Period Missing

rules.name: Referral
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND 3) OR 4
rules.label: Yes

decisions.description: Checks if the case is closed
decisions.name: Is_Case_Closed
decisions.label: Is Case Closed?

Flow.description: Skipping Appointments and Added Outbound Referral to Case Member

formulas.name: CPCheck
formulas.expression: IF(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH({!GetCase.Latest_Collection_Period__c}) == -11, true, IF(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH({!GetCase.Latest_Collection_Period__c}) == 1, true, IF(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH({!GetCase.Latest_Collection_Period__c}) == 0, true,false)))

Flow.label: Create Session

fields.name: AddExtraParticipants
fields.fieldText: Do you want to add extra session participants in addition to the primary participant on the case?

fields.name: AIHWReporterText
fields.fieldText:
This Program is an AIHW Reporter


The Session/Case Note function is only available to this program once it is in Service Delivery (an Allocated Case).

screens.name: CaseDoesNotHaveProgramSelectedScreen
screens.label: Case Does Not Have Program Selected

fields.name: CaseDoesNotHaveProgramSelectedText
fields.fieldText: This case does not yet have a Program associated with it. Please select a Program before creating a Session.

fields.name: Select_Cases_in_Transitional_Housing_to_Duplicate_Session_CaseNote
fields.fieldText: Select Cases in Transitional Housing to Duplicate Session/CaseNote:

fields.name: NoneSelectedTextCH
fields.fieldText: If a case does not appear then it is not listed as a child case.

fields.name: Select_Related_Cases_to_Duplicate_Session_CaseNote
fields.fieldText: Select Related Cases to Duplicate Session/CaseNote:

fields.name: NoneSelectedText
fields.fieldText: If none are available or you want to select none then press next to continue.

fields.name: ClosedText
fields.fieldText:
This Case is Closed.


A Session & Case Note cannot be recorded for a Case that has been previously closed and most likely already reported to our funders. Please create a new Case for the Participant and then record the Session/Case Note from there.

fields.name: CreateCaseNoteText
fields.fieldText: Would you like to create and link a Case Note to this Session?

fields.name: CaseNoteNeeded
fields.fieldText: Create Case Note?

fields.name: MissingCPText
fields.fieldText:
This Case is missing a Collection Period.


A Session & Case Note cannot be recorded for this Case as it has been more than 2 Months since the last Collection Period.


This Cases Collection Periods have already been uploaded and so this case needs to be closed and a new case created for the new Collection Period.

fields.name: Session_Name
fields.fieldText: Session Name

validationRule.errorMessage: Session name cannot exceed 80 chatacters.

fields.name: Start_Date_Time
fields.fieldText: Start Date / Time

validationRule.errorMessage: A session start date/time cannot be before the enquiry/referral date.

fields.name: Duration_Hours
fields.fieldText: Duration Hours

fields.name: Duration_Minutes
fields.fieldText: Duration Minutes

fields.name: Service_Setting
fields.fieldText: Service Setting

fields.name: LocationText
fields.fieldText:
Location


Select Social Futures Site / Office and then choose one of our office locations from the picklist, or select Offsite / Outreach before recording details of the offsite location in the box below

fields.name: Location_Type
fields.fieldText: Location Type

fields.name: Non_Social_Futures_Location
fields.fieldText: Outreach / Offsite Location

fields.name: SMSAppointmentText
fields.fieldText:
SMS Appointment Reminders

  • If no SMS appointment reminders should be sent, tick the checkbox below
  • Otherwise leave the checkbox blank and select the participant from the below list to send SMS appointment reminders

fields.name: Do_not_send_SMS_notification
fields.fieldText: Do Not Send SMS Appointment Reminders

value.stringValue: Select the participant who should receive the SMS appointment reminders

fields.name: SectionSeparator
fields.fieldText: Click Next to continue to the Next Page

fields.name: Is_this_Session_a_No_Show
fields.fieldText: Is the session being recorded a no-show session?

fields.name: SelectSiteOrLocationText
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Please select a Social Futures Site where the session was held or enter the details of a location if it is being held offsite as outreach.


Press "Previous" to review and amend.

fields.name: Is_this_family_in_Transitional_Housing
fields.fieldText: Is this family in Transitional Housing?

variables.description: Used to pass this session's start date onto subsequent flows
variables.name: SessionDate

variables.description: If true, the automatic redirect to the session / question about completing a Case Note will be skipped. Usually set to True if being used as a subflow from another flow
variables.name: SkipFollowonActions
